lowerCourt: United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit

wikiData.title: Reno v. Flores
wikiData.FullName: Janet Reno, Attorney General, et al. v. Jenny Lisette Flores, et al.
wikiData.ParallelCitations: 113 S. Ct. 1439; 123 [[L. Ed. 2d]] 1; 1993 [[U.S. LEXIS]] 2399; 61 U.S.L.W. 4237; 93 Cal. Daily Op. Service 2028; 93 Daily Journal DAR 3628; 7 Fla. L. Weekly Fed. S 73
wikiData.Holding: INS regulation—which provides that alien juveniles detained on suspicion of being deportable may be released only to a parent, legal guardian, or other related adult—accords with both the Due Process Clause and the Immigration and Nationality Act.
wikiData.JoinMajority: Rehnquist, White, O'Connor, Kennedy, Souter, and Thomas
